page.title: 18Visit of the Lord Mayor
page.content: On Tuesday 18th June 1985 a group of children from Glen Park Primary School performed a gymnastic display for the {Lord Mayor }and {Lady Mayoress. }Carla Whittingham, age 11, presented a bouquet of flowers to the Lady Mayoress. The children combined various movements such as foreward rolls, cartwheels, headsprings, handsprings, walk overs and arab springs, moving along a row of mats. They used a vaulting box to show side vaults, headsprings, handsprings through and straddle vaults. The girls performed their floor routines to music and included many skills they had learned in school gymnastics lessons and at gymnastics club. Ruth Skedgell - 11
